Massive agree! This makes the game feel more... game-y, for lack of a better word. I definitely think it's best for transparent mobs and transparent blocks to be two separate accessibility toggles, both off by default.
This definitely takes away from the 1st person survival experience. Things don't randomly turn see through in life and they shouldn't in Minecraft too
It‚Äôs awful have it be a toggle
While I do like the feature, it should definitely be toggleable.
GET THIS S#!T OUT OF MY SILLY BLOCKS GAME!
Agreed. If anything it's more distracting when everything turns invisible. Being able to walk up to mobs like my dogs or pandas and stare them in the face is fun.
Makes my eyes hurt and makes me feel sick

Transparency needs to be toggleable and simply ruins the game. The point of Minecraft is to play the game the way the players want not how the developers want. Why force this on people. Been away from Bedrock and playing modded Java for awhile but come back to play on realms with friends every so often. If this becomes a feature that can't be turned off then you can say good bye to me forever.

Omg I used to like seeing and interacting with mobs up close and taking screenshots. They look absolutely AWFUL now with the transparency. What was the point?? They should make it a toggle at LEAST, this is one of the worst things I've seen... very disappointing.
Me too this should be added cause while your fighting you have to change or take the food in your inventory takes time

Yeti crabs and angler fish would be the mobs to make it unique, glow squids could also be moved here. Compressed stone could spawn exclusively here to give builders a reason to go down here along with increased diamond generation due to the pressure of the water. The diamonds will be as common as gold is the badlands, but you can't wear armor or you'll be compressed by the water. YetI crabs will be neutral, and drowns will spawn here a lot. Hope you like this idea of how it could work(the diamond or will be in the compressed stone)
It'd be cool to see more bioluminescence and this is a great place for some illuminant flora (and fauna?)
I think this biome will going to be a paradise

The same thing happened to me. The spawn height was at 100 but when I logged out yesterday I was at 13.  Everything gone except ender chest & player inventory

Even the artwork I had in my tower was gone      At least I've still got my home but all my pets have gone, the local village is a ghost town.    My house is now at a height of 165 instead of 82.
problem jest tez z tr√≥jzƒôbami. wszystko co jest znane za moba zniknƒô≈Ço.
Hi I was playing in my survival world and a chunk of my world while I was mining the bottom was gonna and the bed rock and all that was there was the void everything was gone

Same thing happened to me, I died in the nether and when I was spawned back in the overworld it was in the original starting spawn point. All my double chests were single and had nothing in them also I could break blocks but they wouldn't drop anything the height level had changed and the clouds were at ground level. I returned to the nether and everything was normal there, tried a different portal back to the overworld and spawned in the middle of a block.

When I logged in, I was at least 100 blocks from spawn. My friend tried to join but kept falling through the world. The solid blocks that were next to me did not render for him. It's like my world to him, was made of void. No one can join survival worlds in beta right now. Also all mobs in the area suffocated. My village castle spawned 3 iron golems. They were gone too. My double chests were single and now empty. I found some stuff in a cave around 60 blocks down. The rest probably despawned before I got there, or got lost in a block. The nether seems unaffected, but coming back I spawned into a solid block. Nearly suffocated.

Same here, very bummed. Chests empty, 75ish hour map room lost.

Eu estava entrando no meu mundo quando apareci no nether com meus itens jogados no ch√£o, tentei voltar para minha casa mas o portal abriu na bedrock sendo bem dif√≠cil isso acontecer j√° que n√£o tem como construir na camada ~ -1 ~ os itens de todos os ba√∫s desapareceram e ba√∫s duplos estavam separados um do lado do outro todos os animais da minha casa sumiram os mapas das molduras haviam bulgado porque eu toquei na moldura e ela aumentou de tamanho mas o mapa n√£o estava l√° mas no nether estava tudo do jeito que eu havia deixado

I was entering my world when I appeared in nether with my items thrown on the ground, I tried to go back to my house but the portal opened in bedrock and it was very difficult for this to happen since there is no way to build in the layer ~ -1 ~ the items of all chests disappeared and double chests were separated next to each other all the animals in my house disappeared the maps in the frames had bugged because I touched the frame and it increased in size but the map was not there but in the nether everything was the way I had left
latest patch today has made this bug even worse. Now the nether is unplayable and all of the terrain in the over world is all screwed up so this has extra bugs as well as the initial ones :(
